type.name: Check
type.desc: Options to check a domain or domains. https://www.namecheap.com/support/api/methods/domains/check.aspx

types.type:
The domain check.
<prop opt name="domains" type="!Array"> The domains to check.

type.name: DomainCheck
type.prop: The domain name for which you wish to check availability.
Indicates whether the domain name is available for registration.
Indicates whether the domain name is premium.
The registration price for the premium domain.
The renewal price for the premium domain.
The restore price for the premium domain.
The transfer price for the premium domain.
Purchase fee for the premium domain during Early Access Program (EAP)*.
